channel.title: We the People With Judge Lauren Lake
channel.desc: A horse throws a groom, dislocating his shoulder; a woman seeks payment for baby-sitting her grandson after her son takes advantage of her time.

channel.desc: An altercation between karaoke singers leads to a broken jaw; a man is pushed into a lake, damaging a cell phone.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Judge Mathis
channel.desc: The plaintiff was hired to promote the defendant's business in the media, but she is suing because she has yet to be paid; the defendant says the reason she hasn't been paid is that she failed to do the work.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: When Beverly learns that Linda Schwartz will host Thanksgiving, she becomes concerned that her role as family hostess - and more importantly as Erica's mom - is threatened; Pop-Pop surprises the family by showing up with a new lady friend.

channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: Lainey, Erica and Barry plan a big party while Lainey's father is out of town; Murray is annoyed by the amount of time Adam spends on the phone talking to Dana.
